name: minimap2
description:
Minimap2 is a versatile sequence alignment program that aligns DNA or
mRNA sequences against a large reference database. Mappy provides a
convenient interface to minimap2.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
